trackinfo.title: Die in Prague
trackinfo.lyrics: when heaven greets me I will shake out my sleeves and with them all the scars that always start to bleed seal me in the chasm for fifteen years or fifteen minutes either way, I made it out any way you try to spin it I'm gonna eat and I'm gonna drink and I'm gonna die in Prague I'm gonna die in Prague if no one meets me  when I gloriously arrive it would barely even faze me it would only help me thrive in the darkest of places where there's mold straight through the walls there is no liminal space if it rises, it must fall so I'm gonna eat and I'm gonna drink and I'm gonna die in Prague I'm gonna die in Prague and I'm gonna spit my teeth in the sink and I'm gonna die in Prague I'm gonna die in Prague when heaven greets me my form will fall away and all this skin that binds me up will wither and decay and the inside will stain the concrete in unfamiliar shapes that nag for attention like a shadow in the drapes and I'm gonna eat and I'm gonna drink and I'm gonna die in Prague I'm gonna die in Prague and I'm gonna spit my teeth in the sink and I'm gonna die in Prague I'm gonna die in Prague PLEASE INSERT TAPE TWO
trackinfo.credits: from Video Nasty, released August 6, 2024

trackinfo.title: What's The Matter, Baby?
trackinfo.lyrics: plenty light in this room see the shape of the shadow plenty dark in this room to hide what you can't handle she's gonna need you on the bed she's gonna bleed you 'til it's red and she's not gonna leave this room until I'm done with you I see you have an eight ball in your closet sink it in my pocket trinkets always have their logic, thinking gears turning, tire burning everything in flames curse every last holy name and ride and ride and keep your ruddy hands inside where I can see them, by your side where she can even make them bleed with my exact-o-knife we are the devil we are here to do the devil's work plenty room in your head I'm here to occupy no room in my head so don't even try she and I share meat and bone she and I want you alone they always say the same thing right before I slit their fucking throats arm of justice, long and heavy watch us break it like a levee got us scrambling just to carry-- what's it? three pictures? four pictures? all of us in frame she is my flesh, we are the name good bye good bye and keep your greasy fingers pried off my dress and in your eyes make your synapses dance with my electrolight I am the devil I am here to do the devil's work
trackinfo.credits: from Video Nasty, released August 6, 2024

trackinfo.title: You Only Moved The Headstones
trackinfo.lyrics: I was waiting by the roadside I've got plenty inside I've got a freezer and a meathook and yes I have the tool for which I'm known but contrary to the papers, I leave it alone that's only there as a last resort meals for the elderly and the food is left to me leave your pitchforks at home we are the rust in the chrome we saw signals in the smoke stacks figured they would never let us back taught us to think with our hands and cut 'em off and so you've wandered here and I see that you're scared but where were you before the trumpets blared? we would let you stay but Mister Reagan says we'll be back at work any day care for the family all that is left for me don't ever leave home we are the rust in the chrome
trackinfo.credits: from Video Nasty, released August 6, 2024

trackinfo.title: Napoleon
trackinfo.lyrics: I tip the cattle at the crack of dawn and slide into the river with my flannels on flush my sins and collapse on the lawn visions of livestock with guns drawn and visions of digital dashboards and the AM/FM switch we are not but taxidermied bits I hit the shower when I get inside and stay on the floor until my hair has dried windows open, every nail pried trying your best to hide but I've got two tickets to paradise I only shot four rounds we are all put in desecrated ground always listen to music when I drive on the streets of Concord, California I keep Mac Dre alive I reply with a knowing grin I don't need your permission to come on in I'll get the knives out from the kitchen block and then I'll make all your children talk I'll scrub off the blood, and waste all the chalk and take my dogs for a walk look at all the claim to stake hope they raise some condos here we are all born to broker fear
trackinfo.credits: from Video Nasty, released August 6, 2024

trackinfo.title: Let Me Be
trackinfo.lyrics: I am hungry, but I can't keep down this food I don't mean to be rude I've got plants, in the dark, in my loft I really oughta be tending to  this is not where I thought I'd be this was just a place to run to this was just a shady tree get away from me get away from me I need aspirin, I need my blood to thin I need a key to lock me in I've got food leftover in my fridge better check the date on the tin you don't need to try so hard to catch me out you keep looking for a reason trying to find a way to shout where I'll listen I won't listen wait for the coffin to open wide cut yourself with the electric knife it doesn't even hurt you like it hurt me yesterday blood dries, skin falls away I've gone gaunt, but you'll make it how I want you'll even let me choose the denouement I've got bathwater pooling in our tub that our son could haunt I can barely even look you in the eye too disgusted to touch you I don't wanna see you cry I want out of this let me out of this and let me dance in the dark let me create my own spark let me eat whatever horrible viscera I please grant me the gift of silence when I sneeze get away from me keep away from me
trackinfo.credits: from Video Nasty, released August 6, 2024

trackinfo.title: Cheapen Yourself
trackinfo.lyrics: (Why?) (I've got to go. They've got to see me. Max is having a hard time of it with the co-production people here. I can't let him down like that in the middle of everything.) (To hell with the picture! What do you want it for? What kinda life is that? This Maximillian Marsh, all he does are sex pictures. All he's interested in is big bosoms.) (That's what the public pays to see, including my own. Do you think I want to do his kinds of pictures?) (Why cheapen yourself when you don't have to?) (I don't expect you to understand. You really don't know me, but I must try to be something myself. For me, even a Marsh picture is something of a step upward. And I'm going to do it myself. That means something to me.)
trackinfo.credits:
from Video Nasty, released August 6, 2024
from "Snuff" (1976)

trackinfo.title: Song for Herschell Gordon Lewis
trackinfo.lyrics: meat is meat that's what I've always said whether you're writhing or bleeding never better off dead these bodies built with care were built to spill everywhere there is no time left for the wicked and even less for the ones who watch them burn food is food if it fills you up if it leaves your stomach growling raise a cup and pray that the lord above will bless you with his blood if it's dry, wait for rain sing his name, and eat the mud there is so much time to be wicked and even more for the ones who watch them burn and Danny's got a real good plan to make use of his Ativan by writing 'til his pen hand goes stiff and I have got the rest of it in my own mental tourniquet in Technicolor red and green and all the sickly shades between bones are bones 'til you suck them dry leave room for the camera to track you don't waste the fear in your eyes that stuff can shine like gold in a hill you thought you'd ravaged we've got dark for hours I don't care if the lens is damaged there is value in the wicked there are people who will pay to watch us burn
trackinfo.credits: from Video Nasty, released August 6, 2024
